attributes.title: Call of Duty World at War Rap
attributes.caption: The first JT Music CoD rap which set up many of the musical themes and motifs you'll see in subsequent CoD Songs! This is the video that really kicked us off way back in '09!
attributes.description: The first JT Music CoD rap which set up many of the musical themes and motifs you'll see in subsequent CoD Songs! This is the video that really kicked us off way back in '09!
attributes.display_title: Call of Duty World at War Rap

attributes.title: GTA IV Rap - "Straight Outta Russia"
attributes.caption: This GTA IV Rap was actually the first video we made with the "JTM" moniker. This video ranks highly as one of our most cringeworthy work.
attributes.description: This GTA IV Rap was actually the first video we made with the "JTM" moniker. This video ranks highly as one of our most cringeworthy work.

attributes.title: Left 4 Dead Rap - "Zombie Soup"
attributes.caption: Remember Left 4 Dead? That game needs to come back. Anyways here's our Left 4 Dead Rap!
attributes.description: Remember Left 4 Dead? That game needs to come back. Anyways here's our Left 4 Dead Rap!

attributes.title: Gears of War Rap - "Take Out A Longshot"
attributes.caption: We would probably consider this the first "Nerdcore" song we did. This song actually encompasses both Gears of War 1 and 2.
attributes.description: We would probably consider this the first "Nerdcore" song we did. This song actually encompasses both Gears of War 1 and 2.
attributes.display_title: Gears of War Rap - "Take Out A Longshot"

attributes.title: The Godfather Rap
attributes.caption: What a random game for us to have made a song for, right? Fortunately, if you dig the films then this Godfather Rap translates to that as well.
attributes.description: What a random game for us to have made a song for, right? Fortunately, if you dig the films then this Godfather Rap translates to that as well.

attributes.title: Fallout 3 Rap
attributes.caption: Fun fact: a fan made this music video. We never intended on giving this Fallout 3 Rap a video until someone just did it for us.
attributes.description: Fun fact: a fan made this music video. We never intended on giving this Fallout 3 Rap a video until someone just did it for us.

attributes.title: Left 4 Dead 2 Rap
attributes.caption: Another Left 4 Dead game means another Left 4 Dead Rap. This one is a tad better than the first, you think?
attributes.description: Another Left 4 Dead game means another Left 4 Dead Rap. This one is a tad better than the first, you think?

attributes.title: Call of Duty Modern Warfare 2 Rap
attributes.caption: Some would say this was when call of duty peaked. Fortunately I can not say the same for us (I hope).
attributes.description: Some would say this was when call of duty peaked. Fortunately I can not say the same for us (I hope).
attributes.display_title: Call of Duty Modern Warfare 2 Rap
